text: 1:18 Aposel 26:23; 1 Korin 15:20; 15:23; Efesus 1:10; 1:22-23; Akar Mogomem 1:5Krais, a siosɨn dapanim, ezɨ sios an inivafɨzim. Egha a uabɨ ikɨrɨmɨrir igiamɨn faragha zuir gumazim. Krais Godɨn Otarir ivariam, egha a faragha ovevemɨn ua dɨkafi. God ghaze, Krais uabɨ biziba bar dar dapanimɨn ikiam. Kamaghsua, a Krais gamizɨ, a ua dɨkafi,
